text: The Beilu Yiyu () also known as Yiyu is a Ming-era Mongol-Chinese dictionary. == References == ==Further reading== * Ákos Bertalan Apatóczky: Yiyu 譯語 (Beilu yiyu 北虜譯語). An indexed critical edition of a 16th century Sino-Mongolian glossary. Global Oriental Publishers, Brill, 2009. Category:Chinese dictionaries Category:History of the Mongolian language Category:Translation dictionaries Category:Mongolian dictionaries
title: Beilu Yiyu
